original_text: These are the people who will have life for ever with God: everyone who sees the Son and believes in him. I will raise them all up on the last day. That is what my Father wants.’
korean_text: 내 아버지의 뜻은 아들을 보고 믿는 자마다 영생을 얻는 이것이니 마지막 날에 내가 이를 다시 살리리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: who will have life for ever with God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님과 영원히 함께 살게 될 사람들

sentences.original_text: I will raise them all up
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들 모두를 일으켜 세울 것입니다

sentences.original_text: That is what my Father wants
